nodes.text: Tuanulberry bushes were a type of bush that grew on the desert planet Jakku. They produced edible berries that could also be used to make dye. In the year 34 ABY, the explorer Lor San Tekka wore a dark blue linen tunic that had been dyed with Tuanulberries while he lived in the village of Tuanul on Jakku.

Tuanulberry bushes were first mentioned in the 2017 reference book Star Wars: Absolutely Everything You Need to Know, Updated and Expanded, which was written by Adam Bray, Cole Horton and Michael Kogge.
